description.english: Defeat Matthew Patel without losing a life.
description.french: Vaincre Matthew Patel sans perdre une vie.
description.german: Besiege Matthew Patel, ohne zu sterben.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Matthew Patel senza perdere vite.
description.japanese: Defeated Matthew Patel without losing a life.
description.spanish: Derrota a Matthew Patel sin perder ninguna vida.
Derrota a los gemelos a la vez.

description.english: Defeat an enemy by throwing an object at him while he’s already down.
description.french: Vaincre un ennemi en lui lançant un objet alors qu'il est à terre.
description.german: Besiege einen Gegner am Boden indem du ein Objekt auf ihn wirfst.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un nemico lanciandogli un oggetto mentre è già a terra.
description.japanese: Defeated an enemy by throwing an object at him while he was already down.
description.spanish: Derrota a un enemigo al lanzarle un objeto cuando haya caído.

description.english: Play through a World and reach the boss without getting hit.
description.french: Traverser un monde et atteindre le boss sans vous faire toucher.
description.german: Erreiche den Boss in dieser Welt, ohne Treffer zu kassieren.
description.italian: Attraversa un Mondo e arriva al boss senza essere colpito.
description.japanese: Played through a World and reached the boss without getting hit.
description.spanish: Juega en un mundo y llega hasta el jefe sin sufrir ningún ataque.

description.english: Clear the game once with Scott.
description.french: Terminer le jeu une fois avec Scott.
description.spanish: Termina una vez el juego con Scott.

description.english: In a multiplayer game, reanimate another player at least 25 times.
description.french: En mode multijoueur, ranimer un autre joueur au moins 25 fois.
description.german: Reanimiere einen Spieler in einem Multiplayerspiel mindestens 25x.
description.italian: In una partita multiplayer, rianima gli altri almeno 25 volte.
description.japanese: Reanimated another player at least 25 times.
description.spanish: En una partida multijugador, reanima a otro jugador al menos 25 veces.

description.english: Clear the game in single player on the “Supreme Master” difficulty setting.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Solo au niveau de difficulté "Grand Maître".
description.german: Beende das Spiel im Einzelspielermodus in der Großmeister-Stufe.
description.italian: Finisci la modalità giocatore singolo con difficoltà "Maestro supremo".
description.japanese: Cleared the game in single player on the “Supreme Master” difficulty setting.
description.spanish: Terminado el juego para un jugador en la dificultad Maestro supremo.

description.english: Buy all the items of a shop during the same visit.
description.french: Acheter tous les articles d'une boutique  lors de la même visite.
description.german: Kauf alle Waren eines Shops während eines Besuchs.
description.italian: Acquista tutto in un negozio in una sola volta.
description.japanese: Bought all the items of a shop during the same visit.
description.spanish: Compra todos los objetos de una tienda en la misma visita.

description.english: Defeat at least 200 enemies using interactive objects.
description.french: Vaincre au moins 200 ennemis en utilisant des objets interactifs.
description.german: Besiege mind. 200 Gegner mit interaktiven Objekten.
description.italian: Sconfiggi almeno 200 nemici usando gli oggetti.
description.japanese: Defeated at least 200 enemies using interactive objects.
description.spanish: Derrota al menos a 200 enemigos con objetos interactivos.

description.french: Débloquer et appeler tous les alliés.
description.spanish: Desbloquea y llama a todos los arietes.

description.english: Catch a flying object at least 25 times with Knives.
description.french: Attraper un objet volant au moins 25 fois avec Knives.
description.german: Fange ein Flugobjekt mindestens 25x mit Knives.
description.italian: Afferra oggetti al volo almeno 25 volte con Knives.
description.japanese: Caught a flying object at least 25 times with Knives.
description.spanish: Coge al menos 25 objetos voladores con Knives.

description.english: Clear the game in 90 minutes or less with Knives.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en moins de 90 minutes avec Knives.
description.german: Beende das Spiel unter 90 Minuten mit Knives.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco entro 90 minuti con Knives.
description.japanese: Cleared the game in 90 minutes or less with Knives.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en 90 minutos o menos con Knives.

description.english: Perform at least 10 consecutive head stomps successfully with Knives.
description.french: Effectuer au moins 10 sauts sur la tête d'affilée avec Knives.
description.german: Lande mindestens 10 erfolgreiche Kopfnüsse in Folge mit Knives.
description.italian: Esegui almeno 10 zompatesta consecutivi con successo con Knives.
description.japanese: Performed at least 10 consecutive head stomps successfully with Knives.
description.spanish: Consigue dar al menos 10 cabezazos seguidos con Knives.

description.french: Terminez votre premier match en ligne.
description.japanese: Completed your first online match with Scott Pilgrim Online Multiplayer and Wallace pack.

description.english: Play Online with all characters at least once (including Wallace Wells).
description.french: Jouez en ligne avec tous les personnages au moins une fois (Wallace Wells inclus).
description.german: Spiele online mindestens einmal mit allen Charakteren (inklusive Wallace Wells).
description.italian: Gioca online con tutti i personaggi almeno una volta (incluso Wallace Wells)
description.japanese: Played Online with all characters at least once (including Wallace Wells).
description.spanish: Juega online con cada uno de los personajes al menos una vez (también con Wallace Wells).

displayName.french: Et… l'affaire est dans le sac !

description.english: Clear the game once with Wallace Wells.
description.french: Terminez le jeu une fois avec Wallace Wells.
description.german: Das Spiel einmal mit Wallace Wells durchspielen
description.italian: Completa il gioco una volta con Wallace Wells.
description.japanese: Cleared the game once with Wallace Wells.
description.spanish: Termina el juego una vez con Wallace Wells.

description.french: Mettez K.-O. 200 ennemis en mode en ligne.
description.japanese: Knocked out 200 enemies in online mode with Scott Pilgrim Online Multiplayer and Wallace pack.
description.spanish: Derrota a 200 enemigos en modo online.
